channel.title: [detla] How to make multy bosses [317] rep++
channel.description:
hey i made my own godwars but how can i make
people can multy the bosses?
i rep++
cuz only 1 person can atk them and they are kinda strong lol

item.title: [detla] How to make multy bosses [317] rep++
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

[quote=“rova1, post:8, topic:374349”]@deathscapepkz: you’re code would be incorrect because he just said they are different locations, and if you look carefully at the second one it would be impossible.

OK. For each of those co-ordinates, you must define the region in the area to be multi-combat.

For example, teleport to your first location: 2508-4720

Run to the south-west corner and type ::mypos
Run to the north-east corner and type ::mypos

You now have your lowest x,y and highest x,y which you add to the code I gave earlier. Remember if your area is wider in the middle you need to compensate for this, because this will make a perfect 4x4 square area into a multi-zone only. So in that case you would need to no-clip into the deadzone.[/quote]
got it work poerfect man would nrep if i could do it twice

Read full topic
item.source: [detla] How to make multy bosses [317] rep++

item.title: [detla] How to make multy bosses [317] rep++
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

@deathscapepkz: you’re code would be incorrect because he just said they are different locations, and if you look carefully at the second one it would be impossible.

OK. For each of those co-ordinates, you must define the region in the area to be multi-combat.

For example, teleport to your first location: 2508-4720

Run to the south-west corner and type ::mypos
Run to the north-east corner and type ::mypos

You now have your lowest x,y and highest x,y which you add to the code I gave earlier. Remember if your area is wider in the middle you need to compensate for this, because this will make a perfect 4x4 square area into a multi-zone only. So in that case you would need to no-clip into the deadzone.

Read full topic
item.source: [detla] How to make multy bosses [317] rep++

item.title: [detla] How to make multy bosses [317] rep++
item.dc:creator: @deathscapepkz deathscapepkz
item.description:
@deathscapepkz wrote:

|| (absX >= 2508 && absX <=2697 && absY >=4720 && absY <=9770)
|| (absX >= 3026 && absX <=2800 && absY >=9554 && absY <=4715)

like this?

item.title: [detla] How to make multy bosses [317] rep++
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

[quote=“rova1, post:2, topic:374349”]In client.java search:

public boolean multiCombat() {

Throw this in before the last )

 || (absX >= LLLL && absX <= HHHH && absY >= LLLL && absY <=HHHH)

L= lowest, H = highest[/quote]

i dont get it :S
can u help me
here is the coords i wanna have multy

2508-4720

2697-9770

3026-9554

2800-4715

Read full topic

@rova1 wrote:

In client.java search:

public boolean multiCombat() {

Throw this in before the last )

 || (absX >= LLLL && absX <= HHHH && absY >= LLLL && absY <=HHHH)

L= lowest, H = highest
